name: iracing-season-planner
description: An app to help to plan the season on iRacing

scripts.install: cd data && yarn install && cd ../frontend && yarn install --production=false && cd ../backend && yarn install --production=false
scripts.build: cd ../frontend && yarn build && cd ../backend && yarn build
scripts.postbuild: cd data && yarn install && cd ../frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install

author: Alan Donizete Quintiliano
